DELETE SysDataDictionary INSERT INTO SysDataDictionary
SELECT '${item.instance}' AS dbInstance,'${item.name}' AS dbName, CONVERT(varchar(50),d.name) AS tableName, CONVERT(varchar(60),a.name) AS fieldName, CONVERT(varchar(80),a.name) AS alias, CONVERT(varchar(20),b.name) AS type, CONVERT(varchar(10),a.length) AS length FROM ${item.database}[sys].[syscolumns] a LEFT JOIN ${item.database}[sys].[systypes] b ON a.xtype=b.xusertype INNER JOIN ${item.database}[sys].[sysobjects] d ON a.id=d.id AND d.name!='dtproperties' WHERE (d.type='U' OR d.type='V')
